title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; on PyPI as "ollama".

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; runs entirely in browser, no external accounts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight interactive CLI wrapper for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like server that uses Ollama models for IDE autocompletion.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or Ruby scripts.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and utility builders.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tune Modelfiles, build RAG apps, deploy on Raspberry Pi, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers users via any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models onto Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose examples: CPU-only, NVIDIA, and AMD ROCm variants.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama on Windows/Mac/Linux.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation and NixOS module for installing and service-managing Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but feature-complete Rust crate wrapping Ollama’s REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and dependency-injection helpers for integrating Ollama into C# apps.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official library of pre-converted Modelfiles: Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, integrations, benchmarks and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
